description:
**A heavily edited portion of my first plays of Path of Achra**
--------------------
Path of Achra: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2128270/Path_of_Achra/

 Path of Achra, a traditional roguelike with a dark aesthetic and increasingly deep lore. It encourages the player to combine and abuse a variety of artifacts and unique powers to become incredibly powerful.

 I really like this game. Give it a try!
--------------------
Thanks to everyone who helped out with this episode!

-Mrs K for her unending support and expert waxwork (she colors all the drawings. With crayons.)
-Ulfsire for making this excellent game!
 -Kruggsmash theme created by Topherlicious: topheranselmo.com
 -Kruggsmash theme synthwave remix by Andrii Brynzak: https://www.fiverr.com/freelancers/abrynsound?source=gig_page
 -All of my patient, patient patreon patrons who I couldn't do any of this without: https://www.patreon.com/Kruggsmash
 -Anyone who bought any of my overpriced Teespring junk: https://kruggsmashs-baz
title: Path of Achra
